CustomField.description: INTEG-N / NON INTEG - Y / APEX/CC - N|| WF / APP/ FU / OM - N || Desc -|| SFA -Y/PRM-Y|| VAL - N|| CR# -R10.2 # 816 ||
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Approved'),ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'New'),ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Incomplete')), Provisioned_User__c = "", $RecordType.Name <>'New Customer' ) , HYPERLINK('/apex/PartnerRegistrationProvisionUser?id=' & Id , 'Provision User','_self'), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved'),$RecordType.Name ='New Customer'),HYPERLINK('/apex/PartnerRegistrationLinkToAcct?id=' & Id , 'Link End Customer','_self'),'No Actions Available'))
CustomField.label: Registration Action(s)
